text:
Robert Moyal (21 May 1933 – 5 December 2020), better known as Robert Castel, was an Algerian-born French actor and comedian. He was born in Algiers, Algeria. Castel was known for his roles in Georghiu in "The Tall Blond Man with One Black Shoe" (1972), Andre in "Two Men in Town" (1973) and as Trinita in "Je suis timide mais je me soigne" (1978). His career lasted from 1955 until 2016.
Castel died of a long-illness on 5 December 2020 in Paris at the age of 87.

annotations.surface_form: The Tall Blond Man with One Black Shoe
Je suis timide mais je me soigne
